argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gxsub.1 | |- X = ran G |
| 2 |  | gxsub.2 | |- N = ( inv ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gxsub.3 | |- P = ( ^g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_znegcl | |- ( K e. ZZ -> -u K e. ZZ ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_anim2i | |- ( ( J e. ZZ /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( J e. ZZ /\ -u K e. ZZ ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 3 | #P_gxadd | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ ( J e. ZZ /\ -u K e. ZZ ) ) -> ( A P ( J + -u K ) ) = ( ( A P J ) G ( A P -u K ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl3an3 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ ( J e. ZZ /\ K e. ZZ ) ) -> ( A P ( J + -u K ) ) = ( ( A P J ) G ( A P -u K ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( J e. ZZ -> J e. CC ) |
| 9 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( K e. ZZ -> K e. CC ) |
| 10 |  | #P_negsub | |- ( ( J e. CC /\ K e. CC ) -> ( J + -u K ) = ( J - K ) ) |
| 11 | 8, 9, 10 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( J e. ZZ /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( J + -u K ) = ( J - K ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3ad2ant3 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ ( J e. ZZ /\ K e. ZZ ) ) -> ( J + -u K ) = ( J - K ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ ( J e. ZZ /\ K e. ZZ ) ) -> ( A P ( J + -u K ) ) = ( A P ( J - K ) ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_gxneg | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( A P -u K ) = ( N ` ( A P K ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_3adant3l | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ ( J e. ZZ /\ K e. ZZ ) ) -> ( A P -u K ) = ( N ` ( A P K ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ ( J e. ZZ /\ K e. ZZ ) ) -> ( ( A P J ) G ( A P -u K ) ) = ( ( A P J ) G ( N ` ( A P K ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 7, 13, 16 | #P_3eqtr3d | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ ( J e. ZZ /\ K e. ZZ ) ) -> ( A P ( J - K ) ) = ( ( A P J ) G ( N ` ( A P K ) ) ) ) |
